reviews.review:
I think it's one of the best games ever made. And you should definitely pick it up when it's on sale.

+Novel idea to use portals
+Great story
+Great voice acting
+Funny
+Very good puzzles. They are right in the sweet spot, not too hard but not too easy.
+Graphics have aged well
+Not too long, took about 12 hours for me to complete the story 

- Not too good replayability as it is a puzzle game.

Toller Knobel- und R√§tselspa√ü mit einer witzig sarkastischen Story und einem lustigen Koop-Modus.
Defintiv eine Kaufempfehlung.
Literally a perfect game. That's all I really need to say.

This simply is one of the best games I have ever played. A masterpiece sequel to the masterpiece original.
The singleplayer is great with a story that enthralls you and has guests like J. K. Simmons to make it all the more amazing. And the ending? I simply have never played a game with a more satisfying ending that feels like a genuine ending that I couldn't ask more from.
The co-op mode will certainly make you turn against your friend/partner. One does not simply play it without it eventually happening. It is a fun co-op that adds even more fantastic layers to an already fantastic game.

What can I say about Portal 2 that hasn't been said before? It's a perfect sequel to Portal that sticks the landing in every way imaginable. The puzzles are well-designed and offer a challenge without feeling unfair or cheap. The story introduces new characters and gameplay concepts and it fits into Portal's universe seamlessly. This game is a definite must-play alongside the original Portal. Truly a masterpiece for the ages.

This game is a classic and you can't go wrong with buying it. Plenty of mind-bending puzzles that will test you in plenty of ways, and there's always the community maps when you beat all the main maps. Definitely a game to put on the wishlist.

Play Portal One first. If you liked it, get this. If you don't like problem solving, zooming through the air, comedy, or teleportation, do not get this game.

If you thought the first game was good, Portal 2 bumps it up to a whole other level, with a surprising amount of narrative from what seems like a simple puzzle game.

This game is honestly one of the absolute best games you can find for Co-Op play. Because it is so easy to run and because it has been out for so long there are endless community co-op maps that range from super easy to impossibly complex if for some reason you do not own this it basically is always on sale for a couple dollars. Just buy it you dingus.

Aunque en un principio pensaba que Portal era solamente un juego de puzzles, la historia es fascinante y los personajes entra√±ables, y lo que lo hace m√°s sorprendente es que esta ligado al universo half life con el mitico Borealis.
El juego en concreto mejoro gratamente en comparaci√≥n al primero, la ambientacion es maravillosa y ese sentimiento de estar solo con las m√°quinas me parece que le da un toque un poco inquietante. En mi opini√≥n lo que hace de este una joya  es su mec√°nica de puzzles √∫nica con la que autom√°ticamente relacionas el juego, la fabulosa narrativa que tiene y la calidad de los personajes y lo bien trabjados que est√°n. Pasaras unas buenas horas resolviendo los rompecabezas ya que a comparacion del primer juego se agregaron muchas mas cosas como lasers, fluidos especiales y dem√°s.
Merm√£o q jogo bom da desgra√ßa j√° joguei e rejoguei v√°rias vezes e continuo jogando. O jogo se mantem vivo gra√ßas as cria√ß√µes da comunidade.

Portal 2 is one of, if not the best, singleplayer experiences I've played ever. Certain Parts feel like sharp difficulty spikes where things get much more confusing in chapters like the fall and the reunion, but I don't know if that's more the game having a spike in difficulty or my neanderthal monkey brain not seeing the patch of white in that one spot. Overall, the game is beautifully crafted. Not only is the singleplayer great, but the Co-op mode is just as fun.
9/10
